00009 #define RN_MAX_FRACTION 0.75
00010

00018 int
00019 rn_hash_(int id, int capacity)
00020 {
00021         return id % capacity;
00022 }

00024 rn_link      **
00025 rn_allocate_table(int capacity)
00026 {
00027         return (rn_link **) tw_calloc(TW_LOC, "", sizeof(rn_link *) * capacity, 1);
00028 }

00030 void           *
00031 rn_hash_create(unsigned int sz)
00032 {
00033         rn_hash                 *h;
00034         unsigned int             size;
00035 
00036         h = (rn_hash *) tw_calloc(TW_LOC, "", sizeof(rn_hash), 1);
00037 
00038         if (!h)
00039                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Cannot rn_allocate rn_hash.");
00040 
00041         //h->storage = (rn_link **) tw_calloc(TW_LOC, "", sizeof(rn_link *), 1);
00042 
00043         size = sz;
00044         if(!rn_is_prime(sz) || sz == 1)
00045                 size = rn_next_prime(sz);
00046 
00047         while(sz > floor(size * RN_MAX_FRACTION))
00048                 size = rn_next_prime(size);
00049 
00050         h->nstored = 0;
00051         h->capacity = size;
00052         h->storage = rn_allocate_table(h->capacity);
00053 
00054         return (void *)h;
00055 }

00057 void
00058 h_insert(rn_link ** hash_t, rn_link * event, int capacity)
00059 {
00060         int             key = 0;
00061 
00062         key = rn_find_empty(hash_t, event, capacity);
00063         hash_t[key] = event;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void
00067 rn_hash_insert(void *h, rn_link * event)
00068 {
00069         rn_hash        *hash_t;
00070 
00071         hash_t = (rn_hash *) h;
00072 
00073         h_insert(hash_t->storage, event, hash_t->capacity);
00074         hash_t->nstored++;
00075 
00076         if(hash_t->nstored > floor(hash_t->capacity * RN_MAX_FRACTION))
00077                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Inserted beyond RN_MAX_FRACTION!");
00078 }

00080 int
00081 rn_find_empty(rn_link ** hash_t, rn_link * event, int capacity)
00082 {
00083         unsigned int    i;
00084         int             key;
00085 
00086         i = 0;
00087         key = rn_hash_(event->addr+1, capacity);
00088 
00089         while (hash_t[key])
00090         {
00091                 key += 2 * (++i) - 1;
00092                 if (key >= capacity)
00093                         key -= capacity;
00094         }
00095 
00096         return key;
00097 }
00098 
00099 int
00100 rn_find_entry(rn_link ** hash_t, int id, int capacity)
00101 {
00102         unsigned int    i;
00103         int             key;
00104 
00105         i = 0;
00106         key = rn_hash_(id+1, capacity);
00107 
00108         while (hash_t[key] == 0 || id != hash_t[key]->addr)
00109         {
00110                 key += 2 * (++i) - 1;
00111                 if (key >= capacity)
00112                         key -= capacity;
00113 
00114                 if (key >= capacity)
00115                         tw_error(TW_LOC, "Cannot find link in hash table.");
00116         }
00117 
00118         return key;
00119 }

00122 rn_hash_fetch(void *h, int id)
00123 {

00125         rn_link         *ret_event;
00126         int              key;

00131                 return NULL;
00132 
00133         ret_event = hash_t->storage[key];
00134 
00135 #if 0
00136         if (!ret_event || ret_event->recv_ts != event->recv_ts || ret_event->seq_num != event->seq_num)
00137                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Could not find correct event in hash_table.");

00143 rn_link       *
00144 rn_hash_remove(void *h, rn_link * event)
00145 {
00146         rn_hash        *hash_t = (rn_hash *) h;
00147         rn_link       *ret_event;
00148         int             key;
00149 
00150         key = rn_find_entry(hash_t->storage, event->addr, hash_t->capacity);
00151         ret_event = hash_t->storage[key];
00152 
00153 #if 0
00154         if (!ret_event || ret_event->recv_ts != event->recv_ts || ret_event->seq_num != event->seq_num)
00155                 tw_error(TW_LOC, "Could not find correct event in hash_table.");
00156 #endif
00157 
00158         hash_t->storage[key] = NULL;
00159         hash_t->nstored--;
00160 
00161         return ret_event;

00164 int
00165 rn_next_prime(int ptst)
00166 {
00167 
00168         ptst = ptst * 2 + 1;
00169 
00170         if (rn_is_prime(ptst))
00171         {
00172                 // printf("%d is prime.\n", ptst);
00173                 return ptst;
00174         }
00175 
00176         // printf("Searching forward for next prime... ");
00177         while (!rn_is_prime(ptst))
00178                 ptst += 2;
00179 
00180         // printf("found %d.\n",ptst);
00181 
00182         return ptst;
00183 }
00184 
00185 int
00186 rn_is_prime(int ptst)
00187 {
00188         long            pmaxseek, a;
00189         int             prim_found;
00190 
00191         if (ptst % 2 == 0)
00192                 return 0;
00193 
00194         prim_found = 1;
00195         pmaxseek = (long)sqrt((double)ptst) + 1;
00196 
00197         for (a = 3; a <= pmaxseek; a++, a++)
00198         {
00199                 if (!(ptst % a))
00200                 {
00201                         prim_found = 0;
00202                         break;
00203                 }
00204         }
00205 
00206         return prim_found;
00207 }
